title: Black Hills Energy Offering New $1,000 Scholarships (Black Hills Corporation)
text: ( Source : Black Hills Corporation ) October 19 , 2015 - Two new scholarships of $1, 000 each are now available to students enrolling in the Natural Gas Utility Technician program at Marshalltown Community College . Natural gas utility Black
